pr_title: Exit in dev mode if port is in use

timeline.message:
Exit in dev mode if port is in use

If it is not possible to start a HTTP endpoint to listen
for changes we just immediatly exit with a non-zero exit
code.

Fixes #8416

timeline.bodyText:
Maybe move the two lines above to the if too?
BTW, this change seems unrelated to the issue at hand. Just checking it was meant for this patch?
timeline.author: gsmet

replies.bodyText: This stops an extra vert.x hanging around, before I resorted to the System.exit() blunt instrument I was looking for a normal JVM shutdown, but this extra vert.x was stopping it.
replies.author: stuartwdouglas
